experiences.description: Contributing to the design, development, and deployment of cross-platform mobile applications with focus on performance, offline-first architecture, and secure data management.
responsibilities: Collaborated with the team to build and maintain a server-driven UI CMS application with offline-first architecture using Drift ORM and SQLite.
Integrated biometric authentication (Face ID, Fingerprint) with AES-256 encryption for secure access and optimized local data storage.
Implemented secure credential storage using Google Credential Manager (Android) and iOS Keychain with Associated Domains.
Configured Codemagic CI/CD pipelines for automated Android and iOS builds and deployment.
Published and maintained 6+ apps on Google Play Store and 3+ apps on App Store/TestFlight, ensuring production-ready releases.
